remarks: Absolute value distributes over multiplication.  Proposition 10-3.7(f) of [Gleason] p. 133.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-May-2016.)
statement:
abscld.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
abssubd.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
absmuld $p |- ( ph -> ( abs ` ( A x. B ) ) = ( ( abs ` A ) x. ( abs ` B ) ) ) $.
